en.title: Career Achievements
en.description: My career path as a professional with expertise in Vue.js, Python, Django, Kubernetes (K8s), Rancher, and Linux OS has been characterized by a steadfast commitment to continuous learning and skill refinement. I actively participate in relevant tech events and have garnered recognition through the acquisition of notable certifications and awards:
